mapper.select: SELECT GRP_CD , GRP_NM , STAT , ORD , RMK , CRT_ID, UPD_ID , date_format(CRT_DTTM, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS CRT_DTTM , date_format(UPD_DTTM, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS UPD_DTTM FROM tb_code_group WHERE GRP_CD = #{grpCd}

SELECT GRP_CD , GRP_NM , STAT , ORD , RMK , CRT_ID, UPD_ID , date_format(CRT_DTTM, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS CRT_DTTM , date_format(UPD_DTTM, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS UPD_DTTM FROM tb_code_group WHERE GRP_CD = #{grpCd} FOR UPDATE

SELECT GRP_CD , GRP_NM , STAT , ORD , RMK , CRT_ID, UPD_ID , date_format(CRT_DTTM, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS CRT_DTTM , date_format(UPD_DTTM, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS UPD_DTTM FROM tb_code_group WHERE 1=1
AND GRP_CD LIKE CONCAT('%', #{grpCd}, '%')
AND GRP_NM LIKE CONCAT('%', #{grpNm}, '%')
AND STAT = #{stat}
ORDER BY GRP_CD, GRP_NM
